title: My Summoned Gods Are All Girls From The Demon World
alternative_title: Wo De Zhaohuan Shen Quan Shi Yaojie Meizi ; My Summoning Gods Are All Girls From the Demon World ; Wǒ De Zhàohuàn Shén Quán Shì Yāojiè Mèizi ; 我的召唤神全是妖界妹子
status: Wo De Zhaohuan Shen Quan Shi Yaojie Meizi ; My Summoning Gods Are All Girls From the Demon World ; Wǒ De Zhàohuàn Shén Quán Shì Yāojiè Mèizi ; 我的召唤神全是妖界妹子
description:
Description :
        My summoned gods are all girls from the demon worldYe Yan, the ninth generational descendant of Taiyin Yuanjun, had been despised by the other gods since he was a child. He is determined to not only keep the divine throne of Taiyin Yuanjun but to restore his status as an ancient g** and to become a heavenly deity worshiped by the world. Ye Yan had a strange scent that could attract demons All the female demons who saw him wanted to possess him. Ye Yan wants to restore the name of Taiyin Yuanjun, but the female demons are too tempting. Will Ye Yan be able to subdue these female demons?
